name: 1000 Years
description:
This Game is Made for 7DFPS game Jaam in a few Days. it is still an incomplete game, there is alot to come , whole story implementation is ramaining on hold (After Jaam Maybe). Check My YT channel or follow my Itch.io page for Updates.

Controls : 

W,A,S,D - Movement

L.CTRL - Croutch

SpaceBaar - Jump

E - Open/Close Doors

Minimum Requirement to run this game:

i3-2nd/3rd Gen with 4 GB RAM and i-gpu

 

Thanks
